title: Nomad Unleashed: A Kurtherian Gambit Series
description: They say behind every great man, is a great woman. But what if the woman is a Werewolf? The heat is unrelenting. The Wastelands are coming for New Boulder. Nature’s a total bitch. And then there’s Werewolf heat. Terry Henry Walton has to come to grips with the reality of his situation. Civilization cannot return to humanity without help. More help than even an enhanced human can give. Terry and Char take their relationship to a new level before they head out to find a new home to save the people of New Boulder, to rally the survivors that the world is coming back... And for themselves. Will those living out there allow them any peace? Will Char's pack make it difficult for her to enjoy life now that her Alpha is out of the picture?
author: Craig Martelle
